articles.title: Home from college and bumping heads with parents? Here's how you can get along
articles.description: College is a time for self-discovery and value shifting, meaning students may no longer see eye to eye with parents. This change and a stressful pandemic can exacerbate the tensions, but psychologists say there are ways to work toward peace.
